entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
